name: anigma
description: A user-friendly local file explorer that allows users to browse and view files.
author: Dohyun Lee

scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production tsc && vite build --mode prod
scripts.build:preload: cross-env NODE_ENV=production tsc && vite build -c vite.config.preload.ts --mode prod
scripts.build:electron: cross-env NODE_ENV=production tsc && vite build -c vite.config.electron.ts --mode prod
scripts.build:prod: npm run build && npm run build:preload && npm run build:electron
scripts.build-dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development tsc && vite build --mode dev
scripts.build-dev:preload: cross-env NODE_ENV=development tsc && vite build -c vite.config.preload.ts --mode dev
scripts.build-dev:electron: cross-env NODE_ENV=development tsc && vite build -c vite.config.electron.ts --mode dev
scripts.build:dev: npm run build-dev && npm run build-dev:preload && npm run build-dev:electron
